Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__38.2__Gog: This name, which signifies hidden or covered, is taken in this place, either for the persecutors of the church of God in general, or some arch-persecutor in particularsuch as Antichrist shall be in the latter days. See Apoc. 20. 8. And what is said of the punishment of Gog, is verified by the unhappy ends of persecutors.-- Ibid.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__38.2__Magog: Scythia or Tartary, from whence the Turks, and other enemies of the church of Christ, originally sprung.
